statements: SELECT * FROM free_trials;
SELECT trial_id, customer_id, start_date FROM free_trials WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT trial_id, trial_status FROM free_trials WHERE trial_status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM free_trials WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, promo_code FROM free_trials ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM free_trials WHERE trial_status = 'active' AND customer_id = 123 ORDER BY start_date DESC, end_date ASC
SELECT customer_id, trial_status FROM free_trials WHERE promo_code = 'SUMMER2023' ORDER BY trial_id
SELECT trial_id, customer_id, promo_code FROM free_trials WHERE trial_status = 'expired' AND start_date > '2023-01-01'
SELECT * FROM free_trials WHERE promo_code IS NULL LIMIT 10
SELECT customer_id, start_date, end_date FROM free_trials WHERE trial_status = 'active'
SELECT * FROM trials WHERE trial_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT trial_id, trial_status FROM trials WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT offer_name, discount FROM offers WHERE expiration_date > '2022-06-30';
SELECT trial_id, customer_id, trial_status FROM trials WHERE end_date < '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM offers WHERE discount >= 0.1 ORDER BY offer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM trials WHERE trial_status = 'active';
SELECT trial_id, customer_id, start_date FROM trials WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT offer_name, discount, expiration_date FROM offers WHERE expiration_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT trial_id, customer_id, trial_status FROM trials WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM trials JOIN offers ON trials.customer_id = offers.offer_id;
SELECT * FROM free_trials;
SELECT trial_start_date, trial_end_date FROM free_trials;
SELECT customer_id, trial_status FROM free_trials ORDER BY trial_start_date DESC;
SELECT offer_name, discount_amount, validity_period FROM promotional_offers WHERE discount_amount > 0;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email_address FROM customer_data WHERE subscription_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM free_trials WHERE trial_status = 'active';
SELECT customer_id, trial_start_date, trial_end_date FROM free_trials WHERE trial_start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email_address, subscription_status FROM customer_data WHERE subscription_status = true;
SELECT offer_name, discount_amount, validity_period FROM promotional_offers WHERE discount_amount > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM free_trials INNER JOIN customer_data ON free_trials.customer_id = customer_data.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT trial_id, start_date, end_date FROM trials ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT offer_id, offer_name, discount_percentage FROM offers WHERE discount_percentage > 10;
SELECT customer_name, transaction_date FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM trials;
SELECT customer_id, end_date, start_date FROM trials ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, start_date, end_date FROM trials WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT t.trial_id, t.customer_id, c.customer_name, t.start_date, t.end_date FROM trials t JOIN customers c ON t.customer_id = c.customer_id;
SELECT c.customer_name, o.offer_name, o.discount_percentage FROM customers c JOIN offers o ON c.customer_id = o.offer_id WHERE o.discount_percentage > 10 ORDER BY o.discount_percentage DESC;
SELECT * FROM free_trials WHERE trial_status = 'active';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT plan_name, price FROM plans ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT offer_name, validity_period, status FROM promotional_offers WHERE validity_period > 30;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS subscription_count FROM subscriptions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT plan_name, price FROM plans WHERE price > 50.00;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS num_subscriptions FROM subscriptions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT offer_name, discount_amount FROM promotional_offers WHERE validity_period < 30;
